review: Every time I order it takes at least 1 hour and 45 minutes for my food to arrive. Last time it took 2.5 hours and I had to go out for something else. I was able to get a refund quickly and easily though, so that was nice.
title: Slowwwww

review: After having an issue with a restaurant sending me the wrong food, Glovo support did absolutely nothing to resolve the issue despite the copious amounts of evidence I provided of the wrong-doing. They forced me to pay for food I did not order and could not eat due to a dietary/religious restrictions and would not approve of a refund. There app is intentionally designed to make getting support difficult. The app has no way of alerting me to consent to the restaurant changing my order so they were able to do it with impunity.
title: The Worst Customer Service Ever

review: My account was locked the very first time I tried to use the app.  They wanted ID and Credit info.  Sent that and got denied the unlock with no details on why.  Tried to delete the account to start over - they said I had to send ID again to unlock before I could delete.  Denied unlock again.   I was just told by the customer service in chat that no one can help me, they have no additional info on why I was denied, and that I should use another app, because my account is no longer valid with Glovo.   Beware.
title: Poor customer service and can’t resolve issues

review: I’m trying to get a refund, answer ok, but it’s already 30 days passed and no refund! I checking my bank account everyday! They stole my money! App has a lot of bugs and glitches on my iPhone, like visual UI(test in Zoom mode omg) and logical.. like showing weather like rain but it’s shiny day now.. not refreshing main page and many more.. The prices for delivery is higher than in a Bolt Food, with such quality it should be like 50% lower.. I’ll never use glovo again!
title: Poor service - no refund after 60 days!

review: As much as I appreciate Glovo being there this pandemic, I’m still pained that your rider let me pay triple on a product and you guys promise to refund me, or make the rider send back my money but nothing yet. It’s unfair because I always tip these riders and now I have learnt my lesson not to be good to random people.
title: Got ripped off by your rider

review: Waited 2 and a half hours for nothing. They kept me waiting on my order and it was never picked up and delivered. I contacted customer support and they were no help. All they did was to offer to cancel the order from me and refund my payment within 5-10 business days!!! No future discounts nothing. All I got was automated responses saying that they were sorry. I waited 2 and a half hours for nothing. Customers beware that this could happen to you.
title: Horrible service that doesn’t care about customer

review: 80% of orders are going smooth, but if you are in a bad situation, e.g. courier left your order at wrong place, or order is wrongly delivered, or in any other cases, when you really need apps Support to help you, they’re like: we can just give you Glovo credits, or decline order and we give you back 100% of order amount in Glovo credits. POOOOOREST Support in whole delivery business market. Just order and pray that you won’t need support’s help. They gonna just make you even madder.
title: პრობლემები

review:
This is literally the worst app i ever used in my life they steal your money just because they can and they blame it on "oh we didnt take it it's blocked check with your bank "+ they charge you extra money too . 

 Their costumer service is also the worst they just send you scripts they already have , they never refund you for the canceled orders even the ones they canceled i'm deleting this stupid app and never using it again and i would rate it as a 0/5 and if i could rate them even lower i will .
title: The worst app ever

review:
Although this app appears to be well designed it is fundamentally flawed. 

Besides several visual glitches (that however do not really impact the user experience) the real issue is how the support section is designed: if you open a chat with an operator about a delivery or any other issue, the chat is open in overlay and, if it gets closed or the app crashes (and it often does crash), any active chat is lost unless the support agent writes one  additional response. Until that moment the chat is invisible to the user. 

This is a flawed mechanism that highly complicated support requests for the end user and provide deniability to the service provider about any issue ever reported by a user. 

It is a very unfair policy for the user.
title: The app is flawed

review: Shady stuff. The customer service and help function is deliberately disabled. They want to avoid any returns or complaints. They disconnected their only working phone number too. I’m not sure how they want to survive like this, but will never order here again.
title: Sneaky Business

review:
I live in the USA, we have no GLOVO service here, BUT I have registered in GLOVO, because wanted to send birthday gifts to my friends, who live in Europe. Until today never made a purchase yet.  Today I received an email, that someone used my card information in UKRAINE, ordered food from the restaurant. Thank god I saw an email on time and canceled it before they delivered, and also the representative told me to get my money back in 5-10 business days. I hope I’ll get my money back.
AS SOON ILL GET MY MONEY BACK, IM DELETING THIS HORRIBLE, DISGUSTING APP. 😡🤬😡🤬
title: Would give zero star if they had

review: The app works great and have been a regular customer for a while. The restaurant navigation is bad. A single list with every restaurant you can think of. The worst part is not being able to save a “favorites” list, you are forced to scroll down endlessly to find something to order. The favorites list should be a must for a product like this.
title: Almost...

review: I love Glovo! I’ve been really enjoying using prime, especially while not going outside much during the lockdown. However, the last few app updates, my payments won’t process. So, in order to order food, I have been using a competitor who charges a delivery fee when I’ve paid for Glovo prime but my order won’t complete. Please fix the app issue! And seriously, stop telling me to close my eyes that doesn’t fix the app. I have no intentions to be in denial about your app failing.
title: App has issues

review: Glovo just charged me and never delivered my food. I stood outside for 2.5hrs waiting for my food that I kept being told was “on the way”. I never received the food and was charged. When I contacted Glovo they told me there was nothing they could do. What a scam of a company! Don’t trust Glovo!!! A complete rip off that you have to pay extra for and if the delivery driver decides to keep your food or not deliver to you, Glovo won’t support the customer! Glovo is only out to get your money, they could care less about you as a customer.
title: Scam

review:
After nearly 40 minutes the order was still “preparing” i know the restaurant i ordered from already has everything ready 
When I contacted the support he told me ok we will look for someone to go fetch it ( an app for delivery doesn’t find courier to go fetch the order) 
He ended the conversation when i was still talking 
After one hour another person came to talk to me saying that he will find a solution, but he doesn’t even know how the app works, when i said that i will not accept cold food he cancelled the order.
title: No professionalism (glovo egypt)

review: So I ordered a meal and first it doesn’t show a time estimate until 30-35 minutes later. Then it doesn’t move from “it will arrive in 30min”. I contact them and nothing was resolved, they don’t email you back when you ask to speak with someone else. No phone number is given so you could speak to a person instead of sending emails that have yet to be responded by them. Driver canceled his delivery, I never received anything, and when I went to re order it didn’t allow me to do so.
title: Poor communication and Long wait for nothing

review:
I am always a very happy customer with Glovo - from the outlets to the delivery fulfilment, provided I am paying via mobile money.

I recently linked my debit card because I needed to use the courier service and discovered that only card payment is enabled for that.

I left my card linked, figuring that the choice of when to pay by card or mobile money would be convenient. Then I realised that card payments attract unexplained additional charges that don’t add up. 

So, buyer beware.
title: 5-star with one important caveat - don’t link your debit/credit card

review: This app is one of the few delivery apps that works in Venice, Italy, so I was excited to discover it. However I have been unable to order anything as the app alternatively refuses to accept my credit card, informing me that the payment has not gone through, or tells me that I need to verify my identity. I attempted to do that through the app and it just cancelled the customer service chat I opened. This concept has a lot of promise but the bugs on the app currently make it unusable.
title: So many bugs

review:
I successfully received an order on June 3rd and paid for in cash. More than two months later Glovo charged my debit card for the same order. Their costumer service is basically inexistent, they do not have a phone number and their "help" email responses are automated. After trying with many emails I was finally told the delivery guy filed my order as "cancelled" (even though I received it and paid for it) therefore I had to paid for it and they gave my inquiry a "closed" status.
The people in this company and are straight up thieves.
title: They robbed me.

review:
I never leave reviews for apps but this app is perfect !!!
Everything is spot on, the descriptions , some deliveries are free and the ones that aren’t are not up to 500 Naira, delivery time is accurate and met. 
The food and price description is clear and well communicated and the map is perfect.
title: Perfect

review:
Firstly, the service is great; but the app is subpar (the web application is far more pleasant to use even on the phone)...
However of recently the app overheats the phone (and thus battery empties faster), the phone gets hotter than in most games just for the single order... please fix this.
The app wil also nag you with irrelevant marketing call to action notifications (there is no option to disable just these)
title: Overheating the phone

review: Their ratings are a scam. The food I received was spoiled and when I later tried to rate the restaurant I had no option to do so. This was my most recent order too. I can no longer trust any of the ratings that I see in this app since users can’t really leave them. Wish I had a way to attach screenshots of my conversation with their customer support team, which advised me to talk to the restaurant directly and let them know about my experience. Really??!!
title: I cannot rate my past orders on Glovo app

review:
The only reason i am submitting this review is to point out the hypocrisy of the app, when Ukraine was under attack the app didn’t wait to plaster the stand with ukraine sign, now that Palestine is getting murdered in front of everyone, live on the internet, the app just decided that they are not worth advocating for. 
The is also the fact that the app doesn’t have most of the supermarkets i need to shop at, but that’s is not the  problem i am here to report. Be humane, don’t be hypocrites
title: Hypocrisy

review: This app usually takes me a good 40 minutes to get an order to go through. The credit card processing will spin and spin and will have a pop up saying it won’t go through right now. Other times I will be in the middle of ordering and have multiple items added to my cart and the app will crash. Other times, it will unexpectedly sign me out so I have to sign back in and start all over. This app is trash.
title: Thus app has so many bugs, I’m fed up

review: This was my first time using Glovo  (9 Aug. 2022, in Marrakech).  The food arrived even ahead of schedule. The food was delicious and totally hot even though the restaurant was far. The driver/server was friendly, efficient, on time, and professional.  My first experience with Glovo far exceeded my expectations.
title: Why I Recommend Glovo

review: Do not use this app if you are traveling. Customer assistance is nonexistent. Verification involves needing to provide an official passport and full credit card number information, with no response or confirmation of receipt of this very private and valuable information. High Risk! Use at your own peril.
title: Awful Customer Service, suspect Fraud

review: Glovo basically changed my lifestyle, getting groceries, food from my favorite restaurants that don't have delivery, once my playstation controller died while playing and 40 minutes i had a new one delivered to my door.. i would give 6 stars if i could.
title: Easily the most useful App on my phone

review: The prices on the app do not reflect the actual prices of the items. I ordered a pizza that costs 16$ but the app claimed it was 20$ and charged me 20$ for it + delivery fee. I called the restaurant to confirm the pizza cost 16$. When I brought the issue to glovo they blamed the restaurant before finally admitting (after I sent them a picture of the menu) that they actually charge up to 30% more for items at their discretion. No transparency, completely hidden fee, this is a dishonest practice and I recommend you not to use this app anymore.
title: Be careful, the app overcharges

review: Been using other app and there delivery is very expensive and on top of that it takes hours to get my food delivered , but Glovo u wowed me it came just in time at the exact time they estimated and it was value for money and less delivery fee
title: Am so impressed

review: This app is very very good, I had a terrible judging about it since there’s a lot of bad reviews but I was truly surprised when I’ve ordered. The service was magnificent , the food was good , and the delivery person was kind .it took around 10 min to arrive. I’m satisfied.
title: Amazing!!

review:
As an engineer or “simple user” I have noticed the low time respond and how much attention they payed to the user experience. 
Also the food services,the delivery time is all incomparable with the other companies of food delivery.
Good job, more than satisfied
title: Best food App

review:
Ordered through Glovo for the 2nd time and got a very unpleasant experience both with the restaurant that delivered the food and Glovo client support. Ordered a burger from City Burger and felt very bad after eating it, I had reported this to Glovo support and they said they can’t do anything about it and closed the chat. Why would you do that with a client who got a bad experience within your app ?
This should be seen by the CEO of Glovo and address the poor client support issue the company has in Moldova 🇲🇩.
title: Worst client support ever Glovo!!

review: I want to make a present to my friend in other country, the order was denied, and now they ask me to send a photos of my driver license and my credit cart. It’s illegal ask about it, it just food order for 10 bucks, why should I send something like that? Scammers!
title: Ridiculous

review: Telephone number of the courier was wrong, also courier had the same wrong number for me. It is also unbelivanle that courier only gets first name ans not the last name of delivery contact and every time courier has to call on mobile to het the ladt name so he can deliver order.
title: Improve stuff quick

review: Twice I’ve ordered. First time I got cold food delivered after over an hour. Second time after 90 minutes I still have no idea if food is coming at all. If I could give them a minus rating I would.
title: Awful

review:
Guys, you developed a good and helpful service, it’s true 
But. While staring the application I have no possibility to do something else except the choosing the address of delivery
Me and others progressive people want the possibility for adding the regions of delivery, because i’m living in 500 meters of  available for delivery area and can’t make the order
title: Wanna better fictions

review: I used Glovo 3 times, every single time there was some issues, the delivery is over than 1h30 every single time, and of course the dishes was too cold, the last order was a real disaster, after 1 hour waiting the support said that the delivery in on its way, even i can’t see it on the app, so i checked with the restaurant on phone, guess what, they didn’t receive the order yet. So think twice before using Glovo, you should definitely order 2 hours+ before you are hangry. 👎🏻
title: 2 Hours delivery, Morocco.

review:
IMPORTANT: the option to tip a courrier must be added AFTER the order has been delivered, I’m not gonna tip someone who messed up my order before-hand ever again!!!

Some courriers need to be trained on the orders available for each restaurant, because they don’t understand and bring you the wrong items even if you called them TWICE to let them know what it is.
title: Courriers + app issues

review:
I used the app with my credit card for a couple of months when, for no apparent reason, my card suddenly stopped working with the service. I was then contacted requesting that I send a photo of my credit card and a photo of my passport. Really weird and no way I’m sending that information via unsecured email. 

Thankful none of the other services require sending photos of credit card and passport to use.
title: Really shady

review: No way to disable notifications from advertisements. Only option is to disable notifications completely and then you miss order updates. Therefore they force you to receive spam or inconvenience the courier by not knowing being ready when the order is arriving (which lately takes 1+hr most of the time so it’s easy to completely forget).
title: Sends frequent spam notifications

review: Very poor rating functionality. All without exceptions restaurants have rating between 100 and 96%. Ordering in 96% positive reviewed restaurants I got pure garbage instead of the food. Google maps rating of this place was about 3 stars as I discovered later. So how this place could have 96% positive reviews from 500? I’ve never saw restaurants below 96% positive. How is this faire? Looks like you promote people to buy and eat garbage. What there is no leave a review option????
title: Unfair reviews

review:
جوج دقايق مورا ما خديت الكوموند اللي خلصت بالبطاقة أونلاين تايدق علي عامل التوصيل و تايقولي نخلصو نقدا حيت ايلا ما خلصتهاش غادي تحسب عليه و بلي غادي يعوضوني، الكوبون اللي استعملت للتخفيض ما تحسبش و صدقت مخلصة زوج مرات
I was charged twice, I paid via debit card and after the delivery man got me my order he came back saying that I had to pay him cash and if I don’t he will have to pay himself and that I will be refunded, I paid him full amount and the coupon that I used before did not apply. First and last order
title: I was charged twice خلصت زوج مرات

review: While ordering and paying with credit card I’ve noticed there is no section for tipping the driver. Even though there is a charge for delivery I believe there should be a tip, and a section where cc paying customers can tip the driver, off course optional. Thank you
title: Napojnica/ tip

review: The delivery tracker doesn’t update in realtime. My order said it was being prepared yet delivery was outside my flat for 20 mins! Wasting his time and food is cold. Has happened several times now.
title: The app doesn’t update in real time

review: Used application for restaurant order. Received confirmation that order scheduled. 15 minutes after scheduled time, contacted GLOVO for status. Told that restaurant couldn’t fulfill order because closed. Initially told that I should have received email stating this. Only received email 5 minutes AFTER I asked for status. Communication between restaurant and application broken. Impossible to recommend using.
title: Application Doesn’t Communicate With Restaurant

review: Love this app, we use it all the time for our different needs. The customer service online and on the phone whenever there is an issue continues to be exceptional.
title: Great service!

review: I live in Ukraine but am from the US originally. I downloaded the app, connected my card, and got my first (and only) delivery last week. I tried to order something today and was told that there had been some irregularities on my account and that I needed to contact customer support. It’s a shame that there is no customer support, just an endless loop of FAQs with no number or email to reach out to. I wouldn’t bother with this app at all unless you’re desperate.
title: Uninstalled after one delivery

review: My experience with Glovo has left me extremely disappointed. Not only did they substitute items in my order without seeking my consent, but they also charged my card twice mounting to 38€ and delivered to me only a few items which cost only 4€. They changed 38€ for an item worth 4€ from my card. Finally, they said according to the company policy, they can’t refund money back.
title: Glovo Overcharged and Substituted Items

review: Have used the App 7 times so far, and in 5 of those I have had some sort of problem with my orders. The last two have been the same, after 30 mins the order still appeared as “Preparing order”, and this time I tried contacting Customer Support and no answer from them. Do yourself a favor and install Uber Eats instead. Glovo, if I were Thanos, you would be the only thing that would be destroyed with the snap of my fingers.
title: Bad response time and customer service

review: Friendly and efficient service, the app works great, and is a huge improvement over the other delivery options in Lisbon. I use it for delivering meals when I'm too busy to cook, or have big bags of dog food delivered when it's too far and heavy to carry them on foot.
title: Game changer in Lisboa

review: Easy to order. Wasn’t able to add my phone number manually, but the customer service agent was able to do it promptly. Very nice service and great variety of food spots nearby.
title: Very nice customer service

review: The  big problem of this application is that we can not pay online and always we should pay by cash.
title: Payment

review: Glovo is incompatible with US phone numbers. The app now is unable to take credit cards during order request but will take money from your account. I have 6 charges for attempted orders that ultimately leads me to believe the app is broken. This also leads me to conclude the 5 star app reviews are falsely generated and produced. Cash orders work no problem but nothing else. No reachable customer service to report concerns. Deleted the app.
title: Simply doesn’t work

review: Exercise extreme caution and avoid should you have dangerous food allergies. Over the course of several months the service has refused support for orders which were flawed to the extent of being inedible and in conflict with clearly articulated dietary restrictions. The online support staff are polite but bound by policy which robs customers and enriches a flawed business model. Paying for prime membership offers no beneficial treatment nor support. Avoid.
title: Support professionals are great / the policies are fraudulent

review: I tried to use the service, but onsecond order I experienced total disappointment. Ordered food from a restaurant just 1.8 km away from my address. Order did not appear. Technical support states that they cannot control the restaurants because they have they own delivery. I don't see the point of the intermediary (Glovo) if they can't provide the service. i deleted your app a horrible experience for me.
title: horrible experience

review: I have downloaded this multiple times and cannot place and order.  There is a glitch and no support :-/
title: App is frozen and will not order

review: If you plan to eat anytime soon, or within their guideline delivery times, then don’t use Glovo. They are by far the worst delivery service I’ve ever used regarding timeliness. Sometimes you wait 1 - 1.5 hours when they say it will be there between 30 and 40 minutes. I get that there are delays sometimes however when 3 or 4 out of 5 orders are very late, that’s not a special case, it is the norm. If they didn’t have 2 restaurants I like exclusively I would never use them again.
title: I’m Hungry

review: I always have issues with ordering for someone even after it’s stated to indicate the details of the person. The couriers always ends up calling me instead. This should be fixed.
title: Issues with ordering for someone

review: Everytime I make an order the payment goes through cause I use mobile money to make transfer of the payment but each time I do this the app doesn’t get my payment and my money never gets reversed to me it has happened 3 times now how do I fix this and get my money back
title: Review

review:
What can I say! 
Many years here and still finding great jewels around the beautiful city of Barcelona, 
4:30 Am, 
Got munchies, this place is fantastic with variety of beautiful food meaty, vegetarian, and vegan. 
Baked potatoes loaded with veggies, cheese, sour cream.... yummy 
And the Dogs, 
Wow there so nice and well cooked, well balanced and very filling 😋
Overall for late night munch, or an early day start, or a meal before a plane ride, 
Give yourself 45 min from ordering to delivery 😎 
Courier was friendly, quiet, professional, and you will be satisfied.
Cheers to All 
Thank you
title: Late night/Early morning

review:
Not reliable, if you can wait hours for your food you can download it.. prices are insanely high on the app as compared to going to the shop to buy it,
You’ll save a lot of money even if you go to the store and back with Uber.. to make matters worse, if you get fed up with waiting hours for your order and you cancel they’ll charge you a fee of half or more than the item you ordered 
New face of scam!
title: Useless app

review: They have issues with missing items in the deliveries. The last straw was an issue I had w an order - the restaurant basically gave me water instead of Pho soup - it didn’t taste bad it was water. I had previously ordered before same dish and the company refused to refund me the order. Don’t order !! If after 50 orders they are going to fight with me about a soup. Dumb to lose a good customer that would have kept ordering.
title: Worst experience

review:
In tbilisi georgia, i have ordered from place whats address i didnt knew exactly, so i used "current location" button, software gave a wrong address to courier and he did not found correct place, without any call or message he took my order to the office. 
They charged my bank account and i still didnt got refund!!! After when i told this to others  many people got in this scheme same way! So be careful!!!
title: Scam

review:
Placed an order. Got canceled because of the address. Address was the same as always. No explanations. Chatted to get the refund, offered platform refund, lady pushing back no to refund my card. 
Finally she refunds the money, different amount from original amount... asked why, she said that one item was not available and they just continued the order with out saying... it was the main dish...
Stay away...
title: Very bad customer service

review: All I wanted was to use the app to order food. They locked my account and required my personally identifiable documents to “unlock” my account. And after providing them they blocked me unconditionally. Decision final. Now I can’t use their app and they have all my personal info in their system. I requested they remove all my info per GDPR and have not heard back. Typical. Don’t use Glovo unless you want your info stolen.
title: Horrible

review: I had so many problem orders with Glovo. So curious, that they never try to be customer oriented in Tbilisi. When you have ma y problemed orders with a customer, you have to try to keep him somhow. today was my last day with Glovo. We have lockdown in Tbilisi at 21:00 and i ordered glovo that had to be delivered at 19:40-19:50. it was delivered almost at 21:00 and i literally could not eat Sushi price that i payed. I had to leave it be home at 21:00 not to be punished coz of lockdown. Deleted application forever.
title: Late, and low response

review: I placed my first order on your app for burger, pizza and French fries. Well it was cancelled in minutes under pretense that it was not possible to deliver it with glovo resources. It was not far, I didn’t order it incorrectly or sent it to another city, I didn’t order something strange so if you can’t deliver burger and a pizza I don’t know what else is there to discuss.
title: My firs order and you canceled it!!!

review:
I placed an order and my bank account was debited, yet the order I placed wasn’t activated and my account was debited 
I complained to their help center all they’ve been telling me is that my money will be refunded within ten working days , up till today I haven’t received my money back .
Please you guys should not download this app because they are not trustworthy and they are also scams both the the owner and workers
title: Crazy app not good

review:
App crushing from time to time - I invest few minutes in making an order and it crushes. So annoying. Since Glovo bought Donesi app in Serbia I do not have any other app for ordering items from e.g. supermarkets and I am forced to use Glovo. 
In addition, my two cards were not accepted for some reason, no explanation from Glovo (funds available and I am using the same cards for other online shops with no problem).
title: Worst delivery app ever

review: If you don’t know the area, this app is great for finding food on a quiet night at home. Also easy supermarket delivery. Easy to use, even if you don’t know Serbian. And fast.
title: Perfect for a quiet night at home.

review: I really love this app. It delivers fast, quickly and they always have change with them. Delivered in just 15 minutes!! This is mind blowing. I really recommend this app!!! If you’re from Tbilisi, then I highly recommend this app.
title: Amazing app!!!

review: This app and the way it is managed, I mean, it’s amazing. These guys are ALWAYS polite, they always call you in case they get lost, and the food always arrives in great shape. Almost as if you would have bought it at the restaurant. The notification system is really good.
title: Couriers

review: GLOVO beats all other apps. I’m always gobsmacked at how quick their service is. Delivery takes no longer than 45 minutes - no matter where you live.
title: Amazing

review: This App is crap in Nairobi. Twice I have received damages goods and there was no recourse. The first time was takeout and yesterday I received expired milk. I called the courier in the morning to complain, he promised to return the milk to the store and bring me food milk. He never showed up. When I called him later in the day, he told me that I would have to pay for the service again and hung up. I bet none of these riders are vetted and any unscrupulous person can sign up to be a rider. Be careful.
title: Terrible Delivery App

review: I’m from Alajuela, Costa Rica and I had to send a package to Tres Rios, Cartago and I had to traveled some kilometers in order to be able to send the package. The I had to request from the receiver, to please pick up the package because there was not enough coverage to drop the package where I needed to. That made me wasted time and money. I think Glovo is a very nice service concept but you need to give more coverage, Costa Rica is a very little country.
title: Not enough coverage

review:
I tried to report my complaint in app according to EU regulations, but it was not possible. 

Can you please clarify the specific steps that I should follow to file a complaint through your platform? Is there a specific form or process that I need to follow? How long does it typically take for a complaint to be resolved? Is there any way to escalate a complaint if I am not satisfied with the initial response?
title: Illegal complaint processes.

review: After several disappointing encounters with Glovo’s customer service, I deleted the app in favour of a local competitor. I order in every day and, naturally, issues arise form time to time. Glovo has been unable to consistently resolve them in such a way that I could continue using this service. Besides, some processes are not well designed which lays ground for more issues.
title: A good app that will be killed very soon by poor service and competition that gets it.

review:
So when I received the delivery, where two missing items, i write to support and refund me! Ok, but my bad I didn’t open the produce until later, and find out, the onions and tomate were nasty, one onion was spoiled!! 
And didn’t accept my  claim  because I plead a refund for the missing items!!! 
So I got spoils onions and smashed tomatoes for dinner!!!
title: Missing items from Masxmenos y spoils onions

review:
I highly do not recommend to work with this company in Kyiv , they have too much issues in their app and with the courriers and you need every time to go to their office in order to solve your problem and they have one office located on the left side of the city knowing that the most of deliveries are located on the right side
I hope the main company knows about that and try to solve those problems because your reputation in Ukraine on the line !!
title: Working with glovo in Kyiv

review:
Well apart from the horrible customer support the couriers do a very bad job they take a very long time up to 2 hours just to get something to eat, so you go to the customer support to know where the issue is but you suddenly find yourself talking to a stupid*** person who have no idea what he is doing and he will just say “ i don't know what is the problem you can cancel your order at anytime” and of-course i pay the cancelling fee!!!!!
WHAT AN AWESOME APP LOL
title: Worst food-ordering app ever

review: The app didn’t show the driver had arrived yet. I went down to meet him and he drove off on his scooter before I could get my food. He called exclaiming he was at the address and that I was not there. It was literally the BnB I was staying at. He refused to return to the original address. Customer service told me to call the driver and was no help. I had to place a charge back on my credit card.
title: Driver Drove Off With My Food :)

review:
Honestly don’t understand how can you write a bad review?! It’s an amazing service that honestly should be everywhere!! Always on time, never had a problem and been using this for a year now. 
Really great work! Thank you!
title: Amazing!!

review: I travel to countries that have Glovo often for work (like all the freakin time) but they won’t let you use the app if you don’t have a local phone number so basically it’s totally useless for someone like me which is frustrating because I would love nothing more than to just order some food to my hotel room right now and have a relaxing night :(
title: Don’t Bother if You Aren’t From Here :(

review: I used this app a few years ago with zero issues. Since, they changed their policy to not allow US phone numbers but because my current account only has a US number associated, it won’t let me log on to charge the number. Basically stuck in a “we’ll send an SMS to verify account” “your number is not supported” loop. Awful UX
title: Cannot log in to change phone number

review: Good service , but there is a bug that need to be fixed where location on map is not detected accurately, therefore u will have to write he address urself .. other than that , it’s better than its competitive apps
title: Good service

review: This was my go to app for ordering of anything. But when tipping switched to percentage I just moved away. Why should I tip delivery boy 7.5% and more as he is only bringing the food or anything else. He didn’t help it prepare or anything else. I tip cache now if I have it if not I use other apps that allow custom tips
title: It was my favorite app until tipping was set as percentage

review: I’m using this app in Ukraine. Old address isn’t removed when a new one (out of delivery zone) address is added. It allows an order to be made with out of delivery zone address, however the restaurant gets an old one, and the couriers will attempt to deliver to an old address. I was told that I have to pay the food and delivery fee even though it’s a problem with the app.
title: Address problems

review: On glovo in serbia, most restaurants show as either “unavailable” or i have the ability to schedule for xx hours. I am fully able to order the same food from the same restaurant on the restaurants website for immediate delivery. Seems like a lot of lost opportunities and bad service honestly.
title: Availability of restaurants is completely dysfuntional

review:
Regular user of the app. Rarely need customer service, but what I have needed it, I was surprised how poor the help was.

I ordered pizza—it arrived 2 hours late and entirely incorrect (after calling the restaurant 3x). When I complained the Glovo, Melina was polite, but entirely unhelpful and refused to reach out to the restaurant to get a refund.

For such a strong app, this service is an embarrassment and poor.
title: Bad Customer Service

review: Good service and fast delivery,,,, like the fact that you update us on everything keep it up 🥰🥰🥰❤️pls always be like this even when you become old in the system ... I enjoyed Glovo❤️❤️❤️🥰
title: Good service and fast delivery🥰🥰🥰❤️

review:
My battery last for 48h on iPhone 13 Pro Max. Phone is old 20days. After last update on Glovo app in November Glovo use 41% my battery for 35min of use Glovo order. Glovo app use use almost whole day autonomy of my battery. 
Phone was very hot and start to slow. I want to warn developers to do revisions of last update. My processors were hot insane, and battery usage of Glovo app was 41% I’d battery.
title: Batery issue after last update on Iphone

review:
I actually like the app don’t have problems the thing I hate about it. Is that I can only order stuff near San Juan or in condado. 
I wish I can use the app in my house instead off my friends that lived closed there.
title: Like it.... but

review: For an unknown reason, Glovo decided to no longer charge my credit card for the prime service. Seven days and they have refused to fix the problem, seven days and they have refused to explain the problem, and seven days they have told me they are not basically going to fix it. Absolutely terrible service, you cannot get a hold of a real person, and they just continually send generic replies. I will never use Glovo again
title: Terrible customer service

review: Used other delivery services and this was the best so far , I was getting notifications about my order and I received it at the exact time . I wish I could rate 10 stars
title: Very fast and efficient

review: Cancelled orders all the time from the restaurants after my order was placed for 30+ minutes lately. When they do this Glovo has zero policy for the customer they just cancel the order, no additional refund and no option to even rate the restaurant negatively for failing to fulfill an order. No longer seems to be a reliable delivery app.
title: Service has been slipping lately

review: You might need hours to solve the problem in glovo chat. Awful, unhelpful, not customer oriented. If you were charged the wrong amount, say goodbye to your cash or get ready for very long conversation (you will talk to several service managers in an hour and none of them will find time to check what’s your problem). The worst experience ever. 🤢
title: Awful customer service

review: The delivery guy was extremely friendly.. the customer service is efficient and the application is super practical. Thank you for not taking too much time to satisfy our cravings
title: Customer service

review:
The app works great and the selection of restaurants is more than I could have ever hoped for. It is the best food app in my area. 
My only issue is that I wish it accepted my credit card.
title: Credit card issues

review: i just downloaded the app to order the mcdonalds BTS meal and everything went great! the delivery came super quick and the delivery guy was the sweetest! 10/10 would recommend!
title: its amazing!

review: If u like stress you can download cause all they would do is stress your life so instead cook or go to the restaurant yourself or better still use other apps .. the first time i used it I ordered something small cause i wanted to try it and it was okayish but the second time they didn’t deliver nor refund my money till now and they just keep stressing me … do not download!!!!!!!!!
title: Do not download!!!

review: Pretty good app. Some things could be improved, but overall a very decent app. I like how Glovo is actually interested in your opinion and makes improvements based on your feedback. Keep up the good work Glovo
title: Glovo for english speaker

review: Accepts Chinese phone numbers but not American phones. The whole world uses the same phone system - why is this a problem?
title: Impossible for Americans to use

review: Great service and always got my back when i have missing order or something thank you.
title: Great service

review: The customer service is the worst and they are so aggressive in the phone, also their is no variety of restaurants and last time I ordered the delivery called me and told me your home is out of delivery area please meet me outside the compound and by the way i’m located in dahshur road in 6th of October
title: Worst customer service

review:
After only 2 minute use of this app, phone gets extremely hot. Everything starts slowing down, frame rate drops and glitches occur. Tracking is turned off in the system settings.

This is lasting since i downloaded it in December. Updates are not solving this problem.
title: My phone gets on fire

review:
I indicated incorrect address. In a minute later I tried to update it, I couldn’t. Then I tried to cancel and so I did. It charged me with a full amount. I tried to reach the support which said they couldn’t do anything.
I won’t use Glovo anymore. No one tried to solve the issue. Now I lost money and my order as well. Thanks Glovo!
I will keep using Wolt as they know how to handle with issues.
Bye!
title: No more Glovo

review: Ran out of chicken and ordered some from shoprite through the ‘anything’ function. My chicken was delivered in less than 45 mins!
title: Great professional service

review: Loved the app, it worked perfectly, they are fast and accurate. You keep on getting correct updates on your order status. Highly recommend
title: Great app

review:
3 order and 3 problems.
The first order arrived cold. A cheese pizza arrived cold and the topping was bunched up at one side.
The secod order arrived incomplete. Instead of 2 buckets of fried chicken from KFC, only 1 arrived. 
The third order have never arrived. After 1 hour with the status “your order is been picked up” (imagine burguers after 1 hour) we decided to cancel. Please don’t use this app or at least the service when you are at Barcelona.
title: Terrible service at Barcelona

review: Everything works perfectly and I’ve never seen a bug or a glitch!
title: App works without a glitch!

review:
My order came with missing products. 
Support take 3 days to answer and then require a photo of the whole order (well, I ate some during the three days that passed) and demand the receipt although this isn’t stated anywhere on the website. 
I’m filling a fraud claim with my credit card provider and will be filling out a consumer complaint with the EU.
title: Service is AWFUL

review: It works good in Georgia but you guys keep adding and removing restaurants, it’s quite annoying when I wake up and want food that you added 2 days ago, you removed like 5 restaurants already ik you guys have customs but please just stop this cycle.
title: The change

review: Using the search bar within a store section turns up no results. I have to manually scroll through and find it. And lo and behold, there is the thing I searched for! And why is it the opposite for restaurants? When I select a filter for restaurants they do not include all within that category. I search for them by name and there they are! It’s like this app is in the early beta stages of development. Embarrassing.
title: Search function is abysmal!!!

review: I love this app and idk if that’s such a good thing because now I never want to cook lol. But it works really well and customer service is patient and kind. I’ve never had a problem they couldn’t solve. I prefer it over Uber eats.
title: So so good.

review:
So, we tried Glovo for grocery delivery because we’re in lockdown and we were trying to avoid going out.

The first order went fine.

However, we had a problem with missing items from the second order. Contacted customer support and was ignored.

We decided to give it another try because we thought maybe it was a fluke.

Nope. More missing items and, so far, nothing from customer support.

In addition, we discovered that they double-billed is on the second order. Fortunately, it seems our bank caught that and blocked it but still...

To be fair to the delivery guys, all three were really friendly and quick.
title: Good luck when, not if, they mess up your order.

review: You have been very helpful these last couple of days! Being at home with a newborn you definitely need all the help you can get.
title: You can get Anything you need!

review: I have used glovo for over a year and when everything works it is fine but if there is a problem don’t expect help. Nothing but a bot saying too bad better luck next time. So many other delivery services to pick from I recommend picking any other.
userName: trying to get the job done
title: Customer service is horrible!

review:
There are no words to emphasize the horrible experience I had with this app. It was impossible to place an order and there was no way I could get in touch with anybody from this company for assistance. 

Stay away from this service and use other alternatives, where there is a customer care dept available and means for help when necessary.
title: Horrible experience first time using this app, no call center or assistance

review: Practical application with details from the beginning of your order till it’s delivered to your doorstep quick service
title: Great app

review:
An issue happened during the order delivery. The driver did not respond to my calls. Glovo did not take ANY ACTION, they did not even contact me to inform me or apologize to me about the order delay. I waited on the app for 3 hours with terrible COMMUNICATION with customer service on their chat. They refused to call me after I requested a call from them SEVERAL TIMES. When they finally called, they said they cancelled the order. 
Completely unreliable.
title: TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE

review:
Makes life so easy for me and my family.
 The delivery guys are so polite and respectful until now I’ve never had any issues. For now, Perfect service.
title: Excellent app

review: Horrible company experience. I asked for help getting a refund from a company that had its own personal driver. Virtually 0 help and told me to wait it out after already waiting 3 hours. Ridiculous. The company allows burger king to be on the app w a un reachable number and when asked to help remedy the situation couldn’t contact them themselves. a waste of time.
title: My full experience

review: I have tried many food delivery apps and I guess this is the best one so far, fast delivery, hot food, great prices, cheap delivery and so on. If I could give this app 10 STARS I would go ahead!!!
title: Best app ever

review:
Previously had issue with adding phone number, rendering app useless, it was fixed in couple of days. Kudos for that.

4 star because there is no support on user side just FAQ. And you have to talk to courier to get through to human representative in support.
title: Good app, can be improved

review:
Sve pohvale i za aplikaciju i za način isporuke i dostavu. Bez Glova bi zaista bilo teško u zadnjih dve godine. Zaista ste najbolji!
All compliments for the perfect application and the way of delivery in Belgrade, Serbia. Without Glovo it would be very difficult in the past two years. Thank you! You’re the best!
title: From Serbia, Belgrade

review: Delivery person was very professional and on time. I highly recommend him
title: Top level customer service

review:
Glovo gives you slightly less options as UberEats i.e. when you want to order a bottle of wine or options on specific menu items. 
Also the restaurant option you get are different in ever app.
title: Very fast delivery at airport hotel

review: The order was extremely late, so I requested to be canceled. Representative ignored my requests. After asking 3 time, she finally canceled, only for her to tell me they will not refund my money for canceled order. She starts giving me excuses how Restaurant is busy and that is why my order is so late. I called my credit card company and reported this fraudulent company!!!
title: Horrible customer service

review:
I’ve tried deliveries about 12 times in the last month and it works really well. Today “The Began” cancelled an order shortly after they were supposed to deliver it.   Very bad.  Glovo should penalize suppliers for doing that 
In any business, if you take an order you deliver it - simple 
Before today I would have given five stars.
title: Great app  some suppliers let us down

review: First time using Glovo. I am really impressed by the service. I loved it. You just won yourself a new customer. I will highly recommend to my friends Glovo !!
title: I am impressed !!

review: I had a delivery person literally throw my order at me because he didn’t want to get odd of his motorcycle to come toward me so I didn’t have to walk outside barefoot. When I reported it to customer support, they didn’t apologize and were incredibly rude about the experience. My food spilled in the bag and got on my dress, and now I can’t eat it. I much prefer Wolt and FoodPanda.
title: Bad Customer Support, Rude Drivers

review: Always helpful customer service. Amazing curriers. Hope to be better only glocer’s system. Most often glocerys arenot providing the correct item.
title: Great !

review: Very respectable operation. From all aspects of the order experience. Love the apps ability to be intuitive. Great app all round! Highly recommend
title: Quite amazing!

review: Thank you for you service the delivery was right on time no delay, and the staff was very hygienic fllowing the procedures and he is very polite thank you once again👍
title: Service comment

review:
- one year ago I opened an account, flagged for review.

- tried one more time yesterday, flagged for review. 

I found the requirement to submit photos of identity documents to unlock the account a bit of overkill considering we are talking about orders for $10-20 each.

Both times I contacted customer support and urged them to reconsider this bad experience for a first time customer.

Not sure what the reason was - but another app was happy to take my money and deliver food.  Without any identity documents.

I would recommend to this business to consider other less intrusive ways to manage risk.
title: Never managed to order successfully

review:
Don’t listen the guy with 1 star 🤣
I just signed up with facebook and got delivered! 1 min to signup, 15 min to chose from all restaurants, and another 20min to get delivered! Thanks for another great food app ! 👌🔥😉
title: Signed up in seconds! Really good

review: I don’t recommend this platform. The same thing has happened to me twice. In the app it says my order has been delivered and I didn’t recieve it.
title: I don’t Recommend this app

review: Their service is horrible, they don't respond on messages on time. I've never had such horrible experience with any food delivery company.
title: The most horrible service

review: really impressed with their customer service and support. They are always available and are really quick to assist.
title: customer service

review: The worst company and service. full of liars. Even though I had coupons, when the courier came, they asked me to pay the discount coupon money also. Very impolite and rude stuff also. 😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡
title: Worst Company

review: The app doesn’t have customer service, apparently Glovo doesn’t have a reachable customer service, so if any failure happened to your delivery, you can’t do anything, i have faced this issue myself and couldn’t get to anybody and sent an email and was replied that someone will get in touch with me within 24 hours and no one did and its 2 days now. So be careful when you order something
title: There’s no support

review: They are efficient and proffessional, plus they come with a handy environmentally friendly reusable bag. Not sure whether Glovo is available for night time deliveries though.
title: Very efficient and value for money

review: I placed an order last eeek.  The complete Oder was incorrect not mine.  I did not get anything I ordered. The receipt was less value than the order I placed and no one contacted me to either get me a replacement or credit my account
title: One of my recent orders was incorrect and no one contacted me

review:
The ascent of missing product is something that they always do …How do you expect me to eat without sauce ,no cutlery ,no chicken and cold spaghetti because it took an hour before the driver could bring and I possibly am not home …And when I complained I was refunded 190?….For what?
The last time it was chicken that was missing  and I was refunded 230???…..Do better y’all
title: Missing product

review: Was trying to order food while on a trip to Spain. Made an account, ordered my meal, gave them my credit card information, but had my order rejected because +1 (USA) numbers “are not supported at this time”. Would be great if that was fixed or an email verification was allowed for people with phone numbers that are not supported.
title: No Americans Allowed

review: When running your application in a Muslim country like Morocco, it is important to adhere to the local laws and regulations. It is essential to recognize that not all countries follow the same practices or beliefs as America.
title: Uninstall ans unsubscribe

review: Honestly worst service ever. After an hour of not getting my food order I reached out to support and they said they would look into it. After 10 minutes of hearing nothing I had to cancel my order and I’m sure I was nowhere near getting my food. The people who deliver food are incompetent as well. Never use this app if you are looking for a good, fast food delivery. Just use Uber eats if you need food.
title: TERRIBLE service

review: There was some missing items in the bag and contacted customer service who only reacts via chat and it took 30 minutes waiting for information to then receive an email informing me they wouldn’t refund the undelivered items!
title: They didn’t deliver some items and decided to not refund me for these items

review:
App cancelled my order while it was 6 mins before delivery time. Support told that order was cancelled by myself (it’s not true). Support do nothing to help and I don’t have my order and money both. When I tried to review my experience the app crashed.
Support team not helpful at all. They don’t tru to help you.
App with bugs.
title: Terrible support and bugs in the app

review: Can’t reach them for payment issues. Worst support yet. No direct communication channels. They call you, you don’t call them.
title: No direct support channels

review:
Outstandingly convenient but some couriers don’t look presentable when you meet them. I’d like to meet a person who looks clean, reasonably decent dressed and reasonably polite. 

The app works 5/5 ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ 
Couriers 2.5/5        ⭐️ ⭐️
title: Ortstandingly Convenient But

review: I can barely see what I’m im selecting because the product pics are super small. The app needs some UI/UX work done
title: Make product pics larger

review: Their customer service is really fast and helpful and I like the fact that I wasn’t texting with a robot.
title: Fast response to complain.

review: They need to allow you to turn off the annoying "reminder" spam-type notifications that try to get you to order again. I don't want to disable notifications altogether because that's how I know the order status when I do order from them. It's annoying.
title: Spam notifications

review: From order to reception took less than 20 minutes.  I would recommend this to everyone who is short on time.
title: This is awesome!

review: Everything about Glovo is great but you need to work on the delivery time. It can be frustrating sometimes how the time moves from normal to abnormal waiting time. Great app by the way 👍🏽
title: Work on the Delivery time

review: I placed an order and the order got cancelled cause the bakery didnt have anymore croissant. They called me and even apologized by giving a discount on my next order. Today I tried to place an order and found out they locked my account cause “ I cancelled and order”. Discount cannot be used and they need my credit card. I dont recommand that company to you guys!
title: Shameless company

review: While getting an ETA for instance 12:30,  when the time comes it shift with 5 minutes every time , even when the courier is not assigned and it's obvious that the ETA is wrong. I'd rather get a realistic estimate than see a promising one shifting every 5 minutes without hope!! Please fix this!
title: Worst feature ever!

review: Bug after bug have actually rendered the app physically unusable for its basic purpose. Nothing works correctly, from credit card entry to contacting support to even just entering my address - there is constant breakage and I was unable to just get an order to happen for 30 minutes before I gave up.
title: Breaks Constantly

review: My experience with Glovo has been extremely disappointing. The app has a lot of technical issues, including promo codes that are not valid, or GPS issues that have affected delivery routes and times. Although these issues may be ok, customer support is very bad towards customers and drivers.
title: Extremely bad customer support. The app also suffers of several technical issues.

review: The problem is when you open chat with online service once you leave the chat or exit application and come back when you press on message it won't open again
title: Application problems

review: Amazing app, delivery is  prompt and the good thing is that you guys can deliver products anywhere even in places where most people don’t  offer delivery services. I’m impressed
title: User

review:
I’ve used the app twice since i installed it, and it already one of my favorites.
Great and simple design, easy to use, and the service is excellent, even the carriers are nice people.
I’m pretty sure i’ll keep using it in the future.
title: Great App and an Excellent Service

review: I waited 30 minutes after I confirmed my order through glovo and then they Just cancel it on me for no reason and with no explanation and there was no one that I could speak or chat with to figure out what is going on, I like the app layout and everything but I don’t like customer care, they need huge improvements on their service. :(
title: they need to work on their customer care

review: A “Glover” (Courier) seemingly stole an order for 5 kilos of coffee being sent to a wholesale customer of our coffee business. That is an issue that could have been solved of the company responded. It has been more than a week and I have reported using the app and email and have not received any response from Glovo. We have no other way to reach the business or the courier. So disappointed at the lack of responsibility.

Sometimes the app works. Sometimes it doesn’t. The “order anything” method NEVER processes my credit card payment or allows me to pay cash. Very annoying. I think the company needs to hire better programmers for the app.
title: It’s a gamble

review: My food never arrived and, instead of offering me a refund, the customer service said I could not receive one and instead that I should wander around the street in the dark in the middle of Nairobi trying to find the building the courier left it at. Do not recommend - there are better services in Nairobi that my friends use.
title: No Customer Service

review: It will be very useful if the app allows you to copy and paste te information into the fields. Sometimes you need to make a correction and the only option is to write down everything again.
title: App review

review: Here in Spain there are limited choices for food delivery apps and Glovo is unfortunately down WAY more than it is up recently. Really would rather use this than UberEats but can’t order if an app is “too busy to take your order”….wait, what?
title: Down more than up lately

review: The only downside was that they didn’t take +1 numbers. Aside from that, fantastic all around, love the options of grocery stores.
title: Phone

review: I love Glovo since I have little time to do errands and it always comes handy. Glovers are are also efficient and friendly. I recommend giving it a try.
title: Always handy

review: For a startup trying to compete and take market share, they must be sure that their reputation is not the best and after like 3 mistakes and terrible customer handling i will recommend anyone to think more than twice before using them, they should have went demo for 2 years at least with their current quality
title: If there is negative 20 rating would suit most

review: Great service ,takes a while to get a rider  probably cause they aren’t so many riders signed up
title: Service

review: Whenever I’m using the app, my phone gets slow and awfully hot. Maybe it’s a winter mode where they try to warm your hands but it’s almost unbearable. The developers need to do a better job and writing this software so that it doesn’t eat up all the CPU of the iPhone 13 Pro.
title: The phone gets hooooot

review: Have no idea where their pulling their data from on the backend but, they consistently allow clients to make orders to closed businesses and unless you ping them you are left waiting for the food. Extremely reduced restaurant options locally. Wonder who falls for their prime disaster with the app in this condition (3 missed food orders in just two weeks, yikes)
title: An absolute mess

review: Hi, I ordered a coke last week and it arrived room temperature. I was surprised about it, as if I am ordering only one for sure it means I am looking to drink it right away! Is there a way to order things refrigerated?
title: Ordered a coke

review: I was delivered a wrong order some time ago and when I contacted customer care they were very helpful and gave me a very good promo to compensate!
title: Great app!

review: I paid €38 euro and got cold pizza, system offered me €3 compensation and when I contacted support manager he said that system already gave me compensation and he cannot change it. This is crazy, when I am ordering such expensive ordered through Glovo I am expecting protection and support, but not €3 euro compensation and closed chat without response
title: horrible support

review: Today I downloaded the glovo app and had the worst experience I’ve ever had with a company or app.  I will never be using this company or any of its affiliates in the future.  If I could rate this less than a 1, I would.  I couldn’t even get my first order placed.  Such a disappointment.
title: Worst experience I’ve ever had with an app or company

review: This is our First delivery with Glovo in Italy. Puts all delivery services in USA to shame. Delivery was super fast and delivery guys were so friendly even though it was very heavy. No wonder it is so popular.
title: Best delivery ever

review: Anytime i’ve had a problem with an order it is extremely difficult to get a hold of someone from customer service. There’s almost never a way to contact the delivery person and they refuse to give any refunds even when they’re at fault and have repeatedly overcharged me.
title: Horrible customer service

review:
Trying to place an order for 3 days but the app is impossible to work with. Contacted customer service 3 times. Useless. 
Find a different app
title: No customer support.

review:
Their customer service is an insult to humanity... all they do is ask your if they can close the ticket, without ever helping you. At best they offer you free delivery on the next order... like that helps anyone.

App is great when it works, but they mess up to many orders. 3 out of the last 8 in my case.
title: Horrible customer service

review: On vacation and in the country with the language I don’t speak. No option to change language to English  so placing order it impossible. Language in question: Katrvelian.
title: No translation to English

review:
Scammed for 16$ told me they didn’t charge me but the money is gone and even i told you not to cancel my order they did to make me keep waiting 
... Arnaque ! scam 
Mouad / jamal / nouhaila houssam
Bandes d’arnaquers
#glovoscam
title: Worst app ever

review: First time using the app! Easy and lots of great choices! Samuel delivered the best service in the rain! Positive and polite even being drenched with rain! Thank you!
title: Perfect option for a rainy night in

review: Charging me delivery fee for a canceled order, never delivered. Have to pay it by card and my USA card won’t work with the app due to my bank thinking it’s suspicious, so I can’t use the service. Have to clear the debt first and can’t. I always pay the driver in cash. Lost a customer for life over $1, and I can’t pay it so they don’t get the $1 anyway haha.. Very dumb company.
title: Terrible Customer Service

review:
Pretty disappointed 

I have tried 4 different cards and gloves decline all of them and worth thing that they show me error message to contact support team but did not even provide any phone number to call or even email

And I'm not able to make an order by cash for more then 500 hrivnas
title: They cannot make their payments process working

review: I think this app launched to early in the moroccan market, app has a lot of usability issues and bugs. Not enough restaurant. Slow delivery. I think they haven’t figured how they want to operate yet. Drivers have no knowledge or training. App says that restaurant is preparing food while it does do so until a driver arrives at restaurant. Driver use bicycles to bring food from very long distances.
title: Not ready for business yet

review: I am visiting madrid and must gotten sick from weather, this app works wonder. I just have to order pills to reduce fever and i got it delivered at my hotel room super fast!

review: Great delivery experience, poor performance and battery killer! Running on latest iPhone 13 Pro, the app made my phone hot and was draining the battery at an alarming rate. Excessive animations and use of unnecessary vibrations did not help either.
title: Horrible performance

review:
I am chrged twice on same order,
Once on making order and second time after delivery,
Made a complaint on the app with no reply
No customer service ??
title: Multiple charge happened to my credit card

review: when I order food I feel very gentle and I’m happy to eat and the food they deliver is so good I’m happy with glovo in fact the glovo’s director is my father’s friend
title: Amazing

review: I don’t know if it’s just in Panama, but the service is too slow. It takes an hour for the food to be delivered even though the restaurant is like 10 minutes away from my house. I’d rather ask for Appetito24 🙄

review: Seriously, this app has literally evolved over the year to be the one of the, if not the quintessential apps in Romania, especially Bucharest.
title: One of the absolute best apps ever coded.

review: More services, more satisfaction! Customer support is always great & the addition of pictures and English translation makes Glovo so nice to use!

review: How can a big company like this have no customer care number and you can't even report an issue on your order or even chats with a customer service representative this is so wack my money has locked twice using this app and paying through mobile money

review: We were visiting Venice Mestre and stayed at a local hotel. I used the map to indicate delivery location. The indicator gave the wrong address to the courier, which caused a long delay in delivery. I could not get a hold of the driver as well. He followed directions, it was just the wrong location.
title: App Needs Work

review: Order came not as expected, glovo said sorry  but did not do anything to compensate or replace meals.
title: Customer service is terrible

review: So satisfied with the service ; and the customer’s experience is just fantastic; thanks Glovo team ! Keep up the good work 👏

review:
Glovo Casablanca, Morocco
The app is in a loop where the venues list shows and then disappears constantly. Can’t do anything. Closing and reopening the app doesn’t do anything. This happened right after I was prompted with a popup telling me to use my credit card instead of cash, which I did even before the pandemic.
title: App is unusable

review: Great app! I just wish it would allow +1 numbers. Is there a reason to why? I’m from USA and I can’t order anything due to my #.

review: It is not consistent. You cannot modify any of the items. Some days the app does not even work. When i try to order it shows me restaurants and mid order it says they closed. Needs a lot of updates!
title: Could be so much better

review: After choosing an item, adding an allergy note (I can’t eat cheese), and going back to add some desert, then going through with the order, I noticed that in fact my allergy note was not saved... a very costly mistake. I will not be using this service again.
title: Trash app that does not save allergy information same order

review: It’s really hard to imagine this app is available in most countries in South America these days, the app is a fail, customer service is terrible, I waited for 45 min for them to answer while my order took 2 hours to be cancelled without any sign of update coming from the app - it’s hard to accept when you’re hungry
title: Simply the worse delivery app in the market

review:
After using the service in my credit card for at least 7 orders, I made an order which was a bit higher in value (less than 30 dollars though) and an incompetent staff member called to tell me I need to submit an image of my national ID via email to be able to make an order higher than 20 dollars!!!!!
Lovely company!
title: Incompetent staff, horrible experience

review: Great service, the only issue was entering the address. App is not user friendly if the address is not recognized
title: Great service, the only issue was entering the address.

review: Very effective application, fast and excellent service. User friendly application.

review: As other helpful reviews point out, the service and the app are so bad on so many levels. It really stands out in the abysmal apps hall of fame. I won’t repeat others since most if not all bad reviews are saying the same things that I experienced myself. Just do a favor to you and use any other service.

review: Use this multiple times a week for food, grocery and basic needs delivery. Definitely best app in Georgia🇬🇪 for delivery services 👍👍👍!!!

review: Courier took my food and then cancelled order, after 3-4 hours different courier delivered cold and bad condition food, i had no idea what to do or how to get back my money because i paid with credit card, i even pay additional money for delivery and for courier, worst experience, i will never use again your garbage app.

review: Everything worked out very well. The app is easy to use and the delivery person was very kind.
userName: las DC b Jr d G k

review: After going through registrations and choosing the restaurant and ordering. When it gets to payment I have to enter a mobile number the issue is my country not listed. Around 15 countries are there.

review: The Platforms is creating jobs and growing business that’s a great business model.

review: Easy to delivery and more safe when you can see the driver how he delivery your order to your home that good you can follow the driver and plz glovo need discounts (:

review: Check Glovo Ecuador, no phone to complain, only by mail, they don’t answer. Last time I ordered food and restaurant didn’t have what I ordered. I canceled with the courier but still they charged me the order. 2 months still no answer or money returned...

review: The sight is great until you run into a problem. For example an item was not brought to me. When I notified them they said they would look into it and get back to me. NEVER happened. review: Do not order from this place. They sent an order with most of my items missing and the response I got was basically “Sorry for the issue, we will make sure it does not happen again.” Contacting costumer support just ends in n automatic message with no help at all.

review: User friendly, efficient, safe, makes almost anything accessible

review: I am from the U.S and was looking for a reliable food service delivery. THIS IS NOT IT. Tried placing an order which got cancelled twice by glovo and proceeded to try and contact customer service, and they were extremely unhelpful and only kept repeating there was high demand. Didn’t apologize or anything for the problems i kept encountering. Go to ubereats or deliveroo, much more reliable.
title: WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE!!!

review:
If you're in Africa avoid this App or get ready to starve to death.

The meals shown on the app is never available by the resturants. And they will confirm the order only to disappoint you hours later by saying the item is not available.

This is so bad and inhuman and this kind of situation will ruin your day.

Avoid this app or have a bad day.
title: Avoid this app

review: The app is good, but I need an option where I can leave notes for example if I don’t want lettuce on my burger, I want to get it without lettuce.
userName: First fan and would be forever

review: Order takes too much time to get to the receiver

review: Whenever I pay with card they manage to overcharge me, Last time They charged me 3 times the amount and said it was a mistake, 5 days laters still waiting for my refund. review: They really need to work on their app! It is glitching and honestly I ended up paying twice and it never showed up as an incoming order. Thoroughly disappointed! The worst aspect is there’s no one to ask for help. Would DEFINITELY not recommend using the app to order food

review: I used to have Glovo Prime but then the company got rid of custom glovo as an option where I could place an order for anything and the delivery guy would get it. Without that feature glovo is just a me too app and not worth my support.

review:
You should add different features to the App such as:

1. Food categories per restaurants - all items are listed from top to bottom instead of being listed per category
2. Add the option to add comments per food item
3. Add the option for “at door” delivery for card payments.
4. Add a live activity widget for iOS 16 devices to be able to track your order on your lockscreen.
title: Lot of room for improvement

review:
App has huge issue regarding location. Customer care is also zero. 
Be careful when you use this app, suddenly your money will disappear from your bank card and in the end they will not provide you ordered items. 

Strong no!

review: Does not support +1 phone numbers and only tells you this at the very end. And then we do have a Moroccan phone number, but we can’t use that because it’s already linked to an account. So annoying and irritating.

review:
I added my credit card and can’t make any orders, demands “person verification”. In chat sketchy, asking for pics of a card with few numbers closed and passport (!!!). For my protection they say.

After I sent them, not enabling orders for a while. What a stupid customer service workflow
title: Cant add payment without weird verifications in Glovo Ukraine

review:
my experience is similar to the other reviews: buggy app and bad customer service

so i ordered a drink to be delivered, and waited for an hour without any updated. i contacted customer service who said it was just picked up.

then i received no update at all whatsoever. no call, no notification, no message,  no location tracking. the app is bugged and i can’t even call or contact the courier.

then i was told the order was canceled because the courier waited too long and i was charged for my full order. but i got no update whatsoever!

i showed them my proof and they just said that they have to charge me.

In the past six months, glovo has presented SO many issues with deliveries. 

Tonight was my last one. SIX IN A MONTH!

They assign you a courrier to bring your order by BIKE covering a longer than 45 min route. 

When you try to contact customer support, NOTHING. NADA. ABSOLUTELY NO ANSWER. 
And when you finally find someone to answer the chat, they are SUPER rude. 

NO TELEPHONE NUMBER to reach out. 

If you have a service that might require customer support 24/7, HAVE 24/7 CUSTOMER SUPPORT. 

That was it for me. 

Tired of how poorly you treat your clients.

review:
I downloaded this app during my quarantine isolation period as it was necessary for me to get food somehow. It was a terrible 0/10 experience and I would’ve preferred starving for two weeks than dealing with the in-app customer service. 

My first order was for a grocery store - they forgot to control for items and SIX out of twenty items were not delivered yet charged to my account. When I provided the receipts from the store, GLOVO credited me back the money surcharge. The annoying part was not the extra money I paid (obviously not great), but the fact that I had to make a new order with a new delivery fee just for the items that were essential to eat that night. 

But ok - this could have been an error with that individual grocery store as well - so I place about a week later my second order for a dinner from a restaurant ( using the credit for the false charges from the first order!). About an hour and a half waiting, I call the restaurant and they tell me GLOVO has not sent them any order - yet my credits were gone - so the money once again vanished and the restaurant closed at 10 pm so I could not place the order again - no food! Love lockdowns <3 

When I contacted customer service to at least get my MONEY back from the order that NEVER arrived - they only returned about half of the price of the order !?! And when I disputed, they said sorry for the mistake but once a refund has been processed it can’t be changed. So, I ended up paying for a service that I did not receive and giving money to an app that CLAIMS to deliver food - yet has failed to meet that simple goal twice in a row. I cant imagine ever being desperate enough to use this again when there are much better alternatives. I’m here typing my first ever review on the App Store simply because I’m hungry and bored and have no food to occupy myself with. 

(I’ve seen five star reviews from people saying “so much potential but they got my order wrong” - SO why did you give them five stars ?? Come on now)
