review: Transaction on the card was marked as suspicious, as my bank informed me about 10mins since I placed the order. While the courier was on his way from the shop, I contacted the support to try and find a solution, while confirming with my bank that your company is not a fraudulent company (joke is on me now I guess). While I was on the chat, your support agent was screaming on the phone to the courier who arrived in the meantime at my parent’s house. Yup, screaming at the courier. Then screaming at my parent “WHO ORDERED THIS FOR YOU”. I am still online with the support, I guess they are not communicating in real time with each other, trying to change the type of payment, I am still hoping that there is a chance for my parents to get their groceries, groceries I am trying to pay for and stop all of the nonsence. But, no luck for us. Order cancelled. Courier got no money. We got the screaming. We got highly unprofessional behavior for what? For something that was not our fault. We tried to fix something that had nothing to do with us, and yet your company ended up charging my account (another suspicious activity) for the cancelled order. 🤯 After all of that, another agent had the audacity to say that the order was canceled because my parents did not know the details of the order (?!). So we got the screaming, the lying, and the charge for the cancellation made by you without offering another way of payment. Excelent customer service and general common sense! (Glovo Serbia)

review:
I am writing to express my deep dissatisfaction with the service I recently experienced while using your platform. As a loyal customer who believed in your company's commitment to swift and reliable deliveries, I am appalled by the way my order was mishandled.

Your slogan, "Order anything you want with Glovo and it will be delivered in minutes," led me to trust that my order would be handled efficiently. However, my recent experience contradicted this promise entirely. We placed an order from restaurant in Serbia using the Glovo app, expecting a quick delivery as advertised. Unfortunately, my expectations were far from met.

After waiting for an excruciating 90 minutes without any updates, we reached out to your support team for clarification on the delay. Their response was that our order would be delivered as soon as possible, along with a promise of a refund for the inconvenience caused.

To my dismay, more than 160 minutes passed, and my order still hadn't arrived. I decided to contact your support team again, sharing the details of my prolonged wait.

The situation took a final disappointing turn when we received a call around 11pm, much too late, informing me that restaurant was now closed, and my order could not be fulfilled. This outcome is not only frustrating but also reflects a complete disregard for the promises made by your company. I was left without the food I ordered, and nothing that was initially promised to me was honored.

I believe in giving companies the chance to rectify their mistakes, which is why I am sharing my experience with you in hopes that you will take immediate steps to address these issues. It's essential for Glovo to uphold its commitments to customers and ensure that such incidents do not recur.

I trust that you will take this complaint seriously and make the necessary improvements to your service to regain the trust of your customers.

I look forward to hearing from you promptly and to seeing actions that reflect a commitment to your customers' satisfaction.
title: Glovo Serbia - Belgrade

review:
The way this company handles itself is disrespectful and quite possibly illegal. Due to their lack of response I will be pursuing legal action. 

After placing my initial order, the app informed me I had to email my credit card (partial) and ID (full), which I did and then managed to place my first order. I was charged for it, and it was delivered and I accepted it. All good. Or so I thought...

Upon trying to place a second order, without any other use of the platform, I received an email stating my account was blocked due to a violation of terms of service, and that the decision was final. What violation? What are you accusing me (erroneously) of? I only used the app once and can't possibly think of how one would violate terms of service on this app...

So I wrote for help on the app and received the same canned response. I replied on the email asking politely to be inform of how I violated any terms, explaining I was sure it was a mistake. Same canned response. Account blocked. Decision is final.

OK. So what if my claim had been for false charges or something else? They deny it...the decision is final...there is NO human contact email or phone to redress....this doesn't seem legal. It sure isn't fair competition for other delivery retailers who can't hide behind the internet.

I wrote to them on Facebook, asking politely for the contact of their legal department. Upon asking why I wanted it, and hearing my case...they promised to further look into it. One week later I contact them again on Facebook and they ask again for my email registered with the app....guess what? They now say I don't have an account. Nevermind that I have emails, bank records, and everything proving I ordered from said email account...and they still avoid giving me the contact details for their legal department.

Be very wary of doing business with this app. You can not claim any wrongdoing on their part...and you can't appeal.

I will be seeking help from the authorities. No one is above the law.
title: BEWARE total lack of responsibility

review: I waited two hours for an order, unable to get in touch with the courier. I called the restaurant, who told me that my food had been ready for well over an hour and that they were going to close. When I called the Glovo support number, while they were very friendly, they told me that they couldn't fill the order because the courier had apparently turned off his phone and just given up. I raced to the restaurant at midnight to pick up the food because I'm a regular there and was incredibly embarrassed by the trouble caused to them. What sort of a delivery app gives you no estimate of when the delivery will arrive, and doesn't offer contact options in-app other than calling the delivery guy? The only other option is sending an email. First time and last time I'm trying this.
title: Total disaster

title: Samo problemi

review: Naručio sam porudzbinu koju sam instant otkazao, jer sam pogrešio adresu i napravio novu porudzbinu. Dobio sam od banke poruku da su mi obe porudžbine naplaćene, a u aplikaciji sam imao samo drugu porudzbinu koju mi je sama aplikacija otkazala. Kontaktirao sam korisnički servis ko ne zna šta se tačno dešava i na kraju njihov odgovor je bio da će mi se naplatiti druga porudžbina sa tvrdnjom da sam je ja otkazao i da je restoran krenuo pripremom narudžbe i da sam zakasnio sa otkazivanjem. Zvao sam i restoran u kom su rekli da je porudžbina stigla i odmah otkazana i da oni neće dobiti pare za istu. Jako loše iskustvo sa aplikacijom i korisničkim servisom. Ne preporučujem.
title: Problem sa otkazivanje i loša korisnička podrška

review: Više puta sam se žalio i ništa niste uradili povodom toga . Mnogo neprijatnih sitacija i niste ništa rešili. Ljudi koji primaju žalbe imam osecaj da ništa je završavaju jer npr wolt odmah reaguje , resi , obavesti , ako je loša hrana vrati novac ako je kurir loš urade neki kompez, otpuste radnike itd. Nažalost , kod vas nisam dobio nijednom dobar customer service , kad su u pitanju problemi na koje se žalim. Ako dođje do još neke sitacije tog tipa a vi ne reagujete , biću prinudjen da prestanem da koristim Glovo i svakako cu svima reci da nisam zadovoljan a dosta puta sam čuo da prijatelji iz mog okruženja imaju iste ili slične komentare . Sramotno je da me izvredjao vas juriš , da viče i da baci hranu na pod a ja se žalim a vi ništa ne uradite po tom pitanju !

title: Обман и наглость

review:
Kuriri uvek kasne sa dostavom i često se ne javljaju na telefon. Nema opcije ocenjivanja kurira, a nema opcije da se ocenjuju ni restorani sto je totalna glupost jer neki vam šalju buckurise koje ni svinjama ne bih dao. Nemaš opciju da pozoves kontakt centar i da tražiš pare nazad ili da se žalis na uslugu i da ti pošalju drugu porudžbinu. Ispod su dva primera:

1. Sinoc naručio picu dobio picu koju nisam naručio jer ne jedem te sastojke i bacio sam je sve je koštalo oko 1400 dinara nemaš kome da se zalis  
2. Malo pre mi stigla porudžbina iz Meka jer ne želim da eksperimentisem sa drugim restoranima poučen od sinoc ali je porudžbina bila sva mokra od Kole tako da je pomfrit i sendvič skroz natopljeni kolom i sve sam bacio  vrednost Porudzbine je 1100 DIN i opet kome se zaliti za lošu uslugu

Ono kako ću se sada ja ophoditi prema kuririma i samom glovu je sledeće:
1. Sve sto se naruči neću plaćati karticom već kesom na licu mesta uz fiskalni račun i za dostavu
2. U slučaju ako kasne neću prihvatati porudžbinu 
3. U isto vreme ću naručiti i preko Wolt aplikacije pa ako stignu u isto vreme primicu Wolt porudžbinu, a Glovo porudžbinu odbiti
4. Sa kuririma biti maksimalno neljubazan

Svima koji čitaju savetujem da se isto ovako ponašaju ako nećete da vas za vaše pare neko pravi ludima.

Slepci jedni kupili su Donesi mogli su da preuzmu i način poslovanja kakav je normalan.

Neko iz Glovo ako čita ovo pa zar vam nije u interesu da imate armiju zadovoljnih ljudi uslugom i da imate ulistane samo restorane koji ispunjavaju vaše standarde. Zašto nema mogucnosti da se da negativna ocena restoranu ako je zaslužio i da negativna ocena kuriru pa da me ne služi više kao sto imate mogucnosti da tražite drugog konobara u restoranu. Po razmislite malo bolje o vašoj usluzi jer vi ništa neproizvodite osim besa ako je usluga loša.

Sto se mene tiče dugo sam posle donesi oklevao sa vasom aplikacijom i pokajao sam se sto sam je instalirao. Od sada koristim Wolt za koji smatram da je isto sranje kao vi smrdljivi Glovo koji ću koristiti kada budem hteo da se poigram i nasalim sa svima vama koji ste u tom lancu na način kako je opisano iznad.

Vas veoma nezadovoljni korisnik
Bojan Pavlovic
title: Najgluplja Aplikacija

review:
Para empezar el app tiene problemas graves que no entiendo como no los han arreglado , y sin problemas que cualquier QA podría detectar . 

1. No se puede editar las direcciones que agregaste , lo que nos lleva a problema 2 .

2 . Agregar mi ubicación actual ( mi casa ) parece fácil pero una vez que decidí la ubicación me pide más información como señas . Hasta ahí todo bien , confirmas y luego te muestra una pantalla donde no podes ver donde quedo el marcador realmente porque está cortada. Y la sorpresa es que cuando ya hiciste el pedido y ves que viene el repartidor la ubicación no está donde tú la pusiste . Por eso ves que muchos reviews dicen que el conductor siempre llegar al lugar equivocado . Y volvemos al punto 1 , no puedo cambiar nada de esa dirección o eliminarla , solo agregar nuevas que tendrán el mismo problema .

3 . Al agregar una nueva dirección si ya tenías el pedido listo , se reinicia y te borra todo lo agregado al carrito . Requiriendo otra vez agregar todo . Lo que nos lleva al problema de pedir un mandado donde nos pide dirección de donde vendría y hacia donde iría . Al escoger esto obviamente se reinicia todo y prácticamente no sirve . 

4 . Si hiciste el pedido , siempre pasará que te dice un tiempo estimado del repartidor que aveces sigue bajando pero el no se mueve . Y de repente se mueve y está fuera de tu casa . Lo que me obliga a no confiar en el app sino estar vigilando desde que compre por miedo que llegue y no me diera cuenta . Muy diferente a Uber . 

Casi que los puntos del 1 al 3 van relacionados con la dirección y el problema de reiniciar el app agregar uno nuevo . Cosas que debería estar solucionado porque me parece crítico para el app. En fin esperemos que lo arreglen pero ahorita esta pésima el app .
title: No sirve para lo que está hecha .

review:
El día de ayer hice un pedido de hamburguesas por Glovo a las 9.35 pm, me lo entregaron a las 11.36 pm totalmente frío e incomible, tuve que tirar la comida
Durante todo ese tiempo nadie en Glovo respondía mis mensajes en el chat interno, que además es la única forma de comunicarse con ellos
Peor aún, me comuniqué con el restaurante a donde pedimos la comida y me confirman que desde las 9.52 estaba listo mi pedido, Glovo simplemente no lo pasaba buscando 
Glovo sigue sin responder mis mensajes, el live chat o e-mails , estoy tratando de reclamar un justo reembolso pero hacen caso omiso 
Una decepción absoluta su servicio 
Alfredo Mendoza , Barcelona
title: 2 horas para un envío

review:
El sabado 11 de julio hice un pedido a las 22.45 de un lo que sea, era comida de un restaurante y me ponía que tardaba de 20 a 30 minutos, resulta que a los 30 minutos veo que han cambiado de repartidor y han tardado 1 hora en llegar a recoger la comida, cuál es el problema... El problema es que una vez ellos reciben la orden, se comunican con el restaurante y hacen el pedido, pueden imaginar que por error de ellos la comida ha tardado en recogerse y plus, traerla a casa... Ha llegado fría, eso no había quien se lo comiera... A quién le gusta comerse unos nachos recalentados y burritos recalentado.... Que no... Cual era el costo de la comida? 40€ La compensación por parte de ellos? 3€ una ofensa completa.... Si uno de sus transportadores es vago y le da pereza trabajar, no debería influir en el servicio que se ofrece!!! Ya les había pasado un par de veces y decidí dar una oportunidad, pero con este pésimo servicio me doy de baja, no se han comunicado ni nada por el estilo... 
Recomiendo CERO ESTA APP!!!
title: Así seas un cliente habitual... No les importa equivocarse y cobrarte...

Muchas gracias .

review:
Non fanno consegne tra comuni diversi, o comunque superiori ai 25km. O almeno questo è quello che ho dedotto, data la totale mancanza di informazioni su come funzionano le consegne. 
Avevo dimenticato gli occhiali da vista a casa di mio padre a Monza e speravo di recuperarli tramite corriere Glovo con consegna a Milano, visto che non ho la macchina e in tempi di Covid non volevo prendere il treno. Niente, nonostante la vicinanza tra i due comuni, e la copertura di entrambe le zone (almeno secondo la mappa sul loro sito) non mi è stato possibile effettuare l’ordine. Che andrebbe anche bene, se almeno mettessero una qualche spiegazione del perché (es. “superata la distanza massima” ecc.). Ho cercato tra le faq e non c’è nessuna spiegazione, nemmeno una ricerca Google ha chiarito come funzionano le consegne con corriere. Alla fine ho demorso, quindi non ho mai testato il servizio. Tuttavia la semplice mancanza di informazioni chiare e precise su come funziona il servizio, le aree di consegna ecc, mi fa dubitare della serietà dell’azienda.
title: Mancanza di informazioni chiare e “overpromise”

review: Nunca califico aplicaciones, pero esta se lo merece. He comprado 3 veces por esta app, la primera me han enviado el pedido incompleto pero lo cobraron completo, esto hace más de una semana y aún no me devuelven el dinero, el segundo igual me faltaron productos que a día de hoy tampoco me han reintegrado, esta vez me suscribí a “prime” para tener envíos gratis y de igual manera me lo cobraron, el tercero trajeron directamente otra bolsa que no era para mi, obviamente aún tampoco he tenido una solución. El único soporte que hay es enviar un correo electrónico que responden en días pero nunca te devuelven el dinero..

review:
Сделал заказ в макдонольсе, деньги сняли с карты мгновенно,
заметил что в заказе указан неверный адрес.

Звоню в поддержку, мне говорят что заказ приготовили и по этому деньги не вернут (да, макдонольс лично для меня приготовил заказ за 3 минуты, а не собрал его из десятков готовых заготовок).

В общем деньги мне не вернули и везти заказ по настоящему адресу отказались. Итого у меня -500грн и испорченое настроение вместо обеда. 
Спасибо, глово, на большее вы не способны 🤬💩
title: Украли 500 грн 🤬

review:
Sale mucho más caro. El doble literal si contratas Glovo en carreras cortas. 
El día de hoy la carrera que costaba 1,85 con Uber o Cabify me costó 3,30 con Glovo, de eso le pagan al motociclista 1,65!!! Me lo enseñó él mismo! 

Injusto ! La empresa gana el 100% más ! 

Dos puntos menos: el costo y la des proporcionalidad en la recompensa a su propia gente !

review: Tuve la desilusión y el engaño de una persona “Mariana”, del chat de atención al cliente la cual luego de más de 2 horas de espera en mi pedido por una falta de repartidor, y cuando en la app permanecía el tiempo de 30 minutos, me pregunto si quería seguir con la compra ofreciéndome un resarcimiento de reembolso del pedido. Me dijo que abonara el mismo y una vez que abonado se me acreditaría el mismo monto en la cuenta de Glovo. Esto nunca sucedió e intenté volver a contactarme con el personal pidiendo algún tipo de respuesta a este inconveniente y ni siquiera quisieron contestarme. Lamentablemente voy a dejar de usar el servicio por su muy mala atención, no culpo a la gente que trabaja en el, ya que por cierto la comida y el delivery fue bueno, pero la experiencia de usuario en la app fue pésima y hasta mentirosa. Desilusión total y adiós a Glovo.
title: La mala gestión del centro de atención al cliente

review: Очень редко пишу отзыв, но считаю что он должен быть здесь. 2 часа назад оформила заказ через Приложение и сервис глово из заведения под названием salateira. Заказ оплатила картой, так как он был на 700 грн. так же оплатила доставку.  Отслеживала заказ и поняла, что метка курьерского велосипеда не движется. Статус заказа «picking up» на протяжении часа на месте. Позвонила курьеру-трубку не берет. Позвонила в ресторан-администратор сообщила, что курьера не было, но наш заказ готов. Она так же звонила курьеру и пыталась связаться с поддержкой-никто ничем помочь не может. Курьер так же не берет трубку. Это кошмар. Связаться невозможно. Деньги улетели. Верните их, пожалуйста! Это был последний заказ. И кстати, другой курьер глово который так же забирал заказы с этого заведения не смог нам помочь и связаться с поддержкой. Теперь я понимаю точно, что это нереально. Все это время нам пытается помочь администратор Оксана из заведения salateira. Ей спасибо за желание решить проблему (хотя она здесь не при чем) а вам, спасибо за «сервис». Шёл третий час ожидания заказа, который уже не актуальный. Вот так нужно бегать за Доставкой еды Glovo
title: Можно умереть с голода

review: No hay nada peor que pedir comida y que te cancelen el pedido todo el tiempo, PERO PEOR ES QUE NO TE DEVUELVAN EL DINERO EN EL MISMO DIA, Y ENCIMA TENES QUE HABLAR CON LA GENTE DE SOPORTE QUE SON UNOS INCOMPETENTES QUE NO SABEN HACER NADA
title: NO DESCARGUEN

review: Una hora esperando por mi comida y cuando los contacto me cancelan la orden . Perdí toda mi hora de break para que no me enviaron mi comida . Por lo menos disculparse y enviarla lo antes posible ,pero no simplemente me la cancelaron .¡Que desastre que son!
title: Son un Desastre

Muy Buena aplicacion! Mejor que otras ! In buen detalle El de firmar luego de pagar en efectivo!, Evita tener problemas, ya que tenemos la evidencia del Pago! Yes!

review: Varias veces nos pasa que ordenamos algo y después nos dicen que el precio es otro. Es muy irritante que no actualicen los precios ni los menús, porque llaman para decirnos que no hacen más un plato y hay que elegir algo de memoria rápido porque el chico del delivery está esperando en el telefono. Esto nos pasa el 50% de las veces. Hoy hicimos una transacción que con tarjeta de crédito, pero cuando llega el delivery nos dice que el server de la app no anda y que teníamos que pagarle “cash”, muy irritante! Y es poco profesional cuando ni siquiera ensayan una disculpa con cada uno de estos problemas. Ordenaríamos más seguido con Glovo si no tuvieran tantos problemas.
title: Podría ser mucho mejor

review:
Es un pésimo servicio. Cancelan las órdenes constantemente incluso, las agendadas con tiempo de antelación. Al reclamarles por correo electrónico sobre esa situación te envían un correo que sólo firma Glovo Heroes, (no hay un nombre de una persona real) y te solicitan les envíes tu cédula para verificar tu identidad, (aunque ese documento no es requisito para abrir la cuenta de Glovo) y al mismo tiempo te bloquean la cuenta por actividad sospechosa!!!
 Tampoco existe una manera de cancelar la cuenta. Por eso no lo recomiendo. 👎👎👎👎👎
title: Pésimo servicio

review: Es la segunda vez que pago en efectivo, indicó el monto con el que voy a cancelar. Pero la persona que entrega no viene con el vuelto necesario. Y eso es una molestia. Si yo quiero dar tip porque quiero es decisión mía, no un problema del servicio.
title: Pago en efectivo

review:
Fui ROUBADO por este aplicativo, sendo que fiz um pedido e não sei porque ou por quem foi CANCELADO e além de ficar sem jantar fui surpreendido por uma cobrança de R$7,90 de taxa de cancelamento. Tentei falar com a empresa, porém a mesma reiterou a informação da cobranca.
O que me resta é tomar as providências legais e alertar aonde for possível na tentativa de coibir ou evitar esse tipo de golpe, que por menor que parece o prejuízo para uma pessoa, quando somada às outras vítimas deve render um bom lucro para essa empresa.
title: Golpe!!! Cuidado debitam sem autorização.

Really useful app, not only to deliver food from restaurants but also for personal things (like clothes, homeworks, I even sent a charger once!). The customer service is amazing, they’re all really nice and helpful. Love it!

Una app muy útil, no solo para delivery de los restaurantes, si no también para objetos personales (como ropa, tareas, incluso cargadores). El servicio al cliente es increíble, todos son muy amables y ayudan mucho. ¡La amo!

review: Al momento de confirmar el pedido se cierra la aplicación

review: Achicaron la zona, de un día a otro no llegaba más a mi casa mal ahí
title: Zona de entrega

review:
En mi primer día de uso me llaman del call center para a nombre de glovo indicarme que la orden se va a atrasar. Al indicarle que entonces necesito que me avisen cuando llegan a la puerta que siempre cierran entre 12 y 1 pm la señora me indica que ya ella termino de hablar con el muchacho y que como favor me da el celular del muchacho para que yo coordine con el.
Procedí a llamar al mensajero el cual me indica que ya esta harto de recoger ordenes del lugar que pedi porque siempre le atrasan las órdenes y que el ya esta en el trámite de indicarle a corporativo que envíen a alguien mas porque ya el no de hace responsable.
Mientras busco un numero de “corporativo” para entender que va a pasar con mi almuerzo recibo una llamada de corporativo. Al indicarle que he tenido la experiencia mas desagradable hasta el momento y que quiero cancelar la orden porque no puedo esperar me interrumpe con un “a bueno” y tira el teléfono... ni siquiera supe en que momento se hacia el cargo a la tarjeta y tendré que proceder con el banco a asegurarme que no se realice cobro ni ahora no en el futuro (dado que la info queda en la aplicación)
title: La descortesía en persona

review: Trate de usarlo y una vez fue suficiente para decir NUNCA MÁS. Pedí pizzas a un lugar y después de 2 horas todavía no habían llegado. Era mi cumpleaños. Me dejaron sin comida en mi cumpleaños. Y ni siquiera contestaba el teléfono o me cancelaba el viaje. No podía hacer nada. Un horror. Nunca más
title: Peor servicio de Chile

review: Todo perfecto y el seguimiento de la moto en el mapa, fuera de serie... Gracias.
title: De diezzzzzzz

review: Mejor que Uber Eats se firma en el recibido foto de la factura y eficiente rápido sencillo y más preciso muchas gracias muy satisfecho. Costa Rica 👍

review: Utilizei alguns códigos que me deram crédito e indiquei para alguns amigos com meu código. Simplesmente bloquearam minha conta por atitude suspeita (??????) por mais de um mês e até os créditos que ganhei devido a indicação foram expirados. Ao meu ver Isso é safadeza!! Aconselho a usar o app SHIPP! Muito melhor!!

review: Muy desorganizados cuando ordenas comida, demora mucho tiempo hacer el pedido y que te llgue

review: Glovo tiene relativamente poco tiempo en Guayaquil. Soy una persona que le encanta y necesita comer constantemente por el ejercicio que realizo semanalmente, así que constantemente la he estado utilizando desde que me la bajé hace aproximadamente un mes. No tengo absolutamente ninguna queja; la interfaz es sumamente user friendly, las push notifications que me llegan a mi celular son lo máximo ya que me tienen informado del proceso de mi orden en tiempo relativamente real, los tiempos de espera han sido muy justos y los motorizados han sido bien educados y se nota que los han entrenado bien. En comparación a otras apps similares que están disponibles en la ciudad, Glovo se lleva la corona definitivamente. La seguiré utilizando indefinidamente. Ah y la señorita de marketing que trabaja para Glovo aquí en Gye es guapa y cool 11/10 👩🏻‍💻 👌🏿
title: La mejor Delivery App by far 🥇

review: Buena velocidad!

review: O app tem um design bonito e usabilidade interessante, porem peca em funcionalidades básicas da sua proposta, como por exemplo raramente ter entregadores disponíveis, não ter muitas opções de estabelecimentos e, no pior caso que vi, me oferecer um voucher de R$ 25 (para compras acima de R$ 30), eu fazer uma compra (que totalizou R$ 32) e ser cobrado integralmente no meu cartão. Se há alguma condição para uso do voucher isso está mal explicado e não há motivos que sustentem ter a aplicação enquanto outros serviços com propostas semelhantes não apresentam os mesmos problemas.
title: Bonito, porém com erros básicos que prejudicam a experiência.

review:

Depois de uma hora cancelam seu pedido e oferecem “free delivery” como prêmio de consolação. Grandes *****
title: Péssima experiência horrível

review: Este servicio es de mucha ayuda! Contentísimo!

review:
En otras oportunidades he enviado cosas a clientes y una misma unidad llevaba a 3 puntos distintos y me cobraban la ruta entera.  Me comprometí con 4 clientes y me llamaron a decir que tenía que ser de 1 solo punto . 
Quede MUY MAL con 3 de los clientes 

Si hubiese tenido la oportunidad de dar cero estrellas a Glovo se las daba. 
El conductor por otro lado un caballero e hizo su labor perfectamente bien.  Pero la compañía no me dio la oportunidad siquiera de iniciar nueva ruta desde el punto to hacia mi 2do cliente y de allí empezar nueva ruta para el tercero y de allí al cuarto.  En ese caso me salía más caro pero igual quedaba bien con mis clientes.   

PÉSIMO SERVICIO
title: No cumplieron con las expectativas

review: Solicité un pedido de un lugar a 15 minutos de mi casa en ciclomotor. Ya lo había hecho en una oportunidad previa sin problemas. Luego de 50 minutos me avisaron que solo habían glovers en bicicleta y que no podían hacer el envío. Si no son capaces de hacer entregas en esa pequeña distancia, realmente ed un servicio limitado y pobre. Fueron muy educados la gente de Costumer Service para informarme la cancelación. Pero sin dar soluciones. Una lástima.
title: No cumplen

review: Te cancelan pedido a ultimo momento y encima la atencion al cliente es inexistente. La verdad una verguenza que exista un servicio asi, y mas cuando se trata de comida. NO LO RECOMIENDO PARA NADA

review: Péssimo, péssimo, péssimo atendimento a clientes. Meu pedido não foi entregue e mesmo assim mandaram o email de entregue c recibo da cobrança. Entrei em contato com o atendimento a clientes e a dor de cabeça maior começou. Não prestam atenção no que o cliente diz e tentam o tempo todo falar que a culpa é do cliente sem analisar o caso. Não adimitem o erro jamais. A pior experiência que tive com uma empresa. Fuja. Existem alternativas melhores.
title: Não respeitam o cliente

review: ESTA APP TIENE LA PEOR INTERFACE DE TODAS LA APP DE PEDIDOS, INDISCUTIBLEMENTE ES LA PEOR, NI EN TIEMPOS COMO ESTOS ENFRENTANDO UNA PANDEMIA PUEDEN DAR UN SERVICIO EFICIENTE O POR LO MENOS TRANSPARENTE YA QUE LUEGO DE ESPERAR 30 MINUTOS MI PEDIDO AUN NO HABIA REFLEJADO PROGRESO EN LA APP LO QUE ME HACE COMUNICARME CON SOPORTE DONDE ME DICEN QUE YA ME HAN ASIGNADO REPARTIDOR PUES MI PEDIDO NO TENIA, 30 MINUTOS LUEGO (1 HORA LUEGO DE HACER EL PEDIDO) ME VUELVO A COMUNICAR CON SOPORTE Y ME DICEN QUE ESTA EN PROCESO Y ME CAMBIAN EL REPARTIDOR PARA QUE LLEGUE MAS RAPIDO MI PEDIDO QUE HICE A LAS 1:50P, LES INFORMO QUE EL ESTABLECIMIENTO CIERRA A LAS 3:30 Y ME DICEN QUE EL REPARTIDOR YA VIENE DE CAMINO (ERA MENTIRA). EN CONCLUSION MI PEDIDO JAMAS LLEGO Y ME QUEDE ESPERANDO LA COMIDA DE MI FAMILIA QUE NUNCA LLEGO POR EL PESIMO SERVICIO E INTERFACE DE ESTA PESIMA APLICACION, NO LA RECOMIENDO PARA NADA ME ARREPIENTO DE HABER INTENTADO UTILIZARLA, TIENEN MUCHO QUE MEJORAR. 1 ESTRELLA PORQUE NO PUEDO DAR 0.

As my friend started eating he found blood in the chicken which was disgusting  and with the shrimp beef and chicken the was not even a single shrimp in my food pls fix dis or am going to stop using this app.

Remove 90% of the useless effects and just get the app to run smoothly. Or hire devs that can optimize the code. I literally have to close out of the app after an order so my phone returns to normal temperatures.

This renders the entire app 100% useless and a waste of time because you lack one of the few country code numbers the app can process an SMS to.

review: Their customer service is giving false information and the route system is awful - waiting 60+ minutes for delivery and watching people few kilometers in opposite direction getting the delivery while I wait.

review: I spent 1 hour trying to order and talking to support before they finally told me they can’t verify an account unless you have a Portugal number. Could have saved time just hearing that from the start rather than browsing restaurants, choosing my order, entering my account info, selecting my country code from the list of 100+ country codes they have you choose from, trying my country code and my friends many times,  getting a message to contact support, and chatting for half an hour. Why even offer other country codes if you only accept Portugal’s.
title: Not for tourists!! Do not use this unless you have a Portuguese number

review: Plz add option for more country code phone numbers . Its very limited . Everyone can use whatsup to call for free. So add more country codes like UAE, kuwait…

review: Here's a promo code for your first order but oh no, once entered is not valid. No explanations, just shady business. Hard pass. Stay away!
title: Shady business practices

review: Ive been with glovo for years but recently got my food delivered by a rude italian courier, totally ruined my appetite. Their solution to this issue is a 3 euros promo code and a so called guarantee that the courier will be sanctioned. F off glovo, did you realize there are so many similar app on market that I don’t have to stick with you? I now guarantee you that I’ll never use this app again.
title: 1 star for one rude courier

review: App won’t allow orders without first verifying your phone number. Multiple attempts to verify but the app won’t send a confirmation code.
title: Unusable

review: Hi I made an order yesterday and got debited 33gh from my airteltigo number 0579246492 but it never reflected on the app so I had to pay the delivery guy again
title: Paid double

review: I recently joined the app per my friend’s recommendation. She sent me a coupon code to use when ordering. I signed up and tried to order food the EXACT SAME DAY and the coupon code didn’t work. I figured “hey, no worries. i will try to use it next time”. The next time came around and it didn’t work. Apparently, you have to use it the first time, which wasn’t clearly stated. Even still, I decided to contact the customer service team. They said they couldn’t help me because I had an account that had already been registered. I told them that’s impossible because I just made an account on the day of my first order. I even had screenshots showing that I downloaded the app on the same day. I realized that it may have been a problem with my number because the app wouldn’t let me sign up with my US number, so i use my friends spanish number for the deliveries. They didn’t care. The help person continued to send me the same automated messages for over an hour saying that I already had an account and that they could not refund me or give me another coupon code. They were also very rude and not at all understanding. I felt incredibly disrespected and annoyed that I wasted my money. I would not recommend shipping with them. Also, another time I ordered from them and they said my food would come in 35-45 minutes. It took over an hour and a half, which is more than double the original time. They gave me all of 9 cents USD to compensate me. My order was about $22.50. What am I going to do with 9 cents?!! Like I said, don’t waste your time, money, or energy dealing with this company. If I had the option, I would give them 0 stars.
title: Bad Customer Service

review: Glovo is messing up my promo code and order… why ?? I can’t even send you a mail
title: Promo issue

review: The restaurant dropped one of the items I ordered. I wasn't able to replace it, so the promo code didn't apply. Had to pay full price!
title: Promo codes are a scam

review: Aplikacija je ocajna, celih sat vremena nisam mogao da porucim zbog greske na aplikaciji, morao sam da zovem da porucim direktno i da sam odem. Da mogu dao bih nulu kao ocenu

review: Problem is that many times and now also my promocode I can not use because something went wrong

review:
No response on any platform for issues, contacted through multiple platforms about someone using my email for a Glovo account and no way to get a response.

Update 2/13/22:  Still completely useless.  Nobody responds to the email provided on reviews to contact.  Worst company I’ve ever dealt with.
title: No Customer Service

review: The promo code is automatically added. However, upon making an order the app asks for my address, and when I add my address the promo code disappears, and if I reapply the code a message appears that I have already used it. When in fact I have not! This issue has been going for a while now, and I’m surprised they have not fixed it yet.
title: Promo Code Issues

review:
I would like to start by saying that this app is not only a food delivery app, but also a spiritual guide book that if you are smart enough to read it you can evolve as a person. Via this app you learn patience, how to deal with your anger (if you never had anger management issues after using Glovo I’m sure you will),  courage and self defense skills when one of the delivery guys decides to stalk you all of the sudden and you learn how to enjoy cold food in winter time. 

Also, this app teaches you “magic math”.  You order food for 27.30 lei and you end up paying 52 lei. But every extra fee is totally worth it. For example, Glovo are the only people that understood that I love my food soaked in soda. 

Long story short, if you’re life is boring use this app to order your food, I promise you every order will also bring lots of new feelings and thrill. 

XOXO, Glovo fan! ❤️
title: Are you an adrenaline junkie? Then Glovo is for you!

review: It said the discounted price was charged to my card yet they charged the full amount anyway wasting my coupon essentially.Im not sure why they allow you to apply a coupon midway through even though they already charged you

review: Długi czas oczekiwania. Dopóki się nie upomniałem nie został przydzielony kurier. Nie skorzystam drugi raz

review:
Glovo app tends to get worse on every updates in terms of UX and inexplainable behavior.

During this version which is 7.35.0 (39908), I am logged out occasionally. I need to fill in delivery address every time I open the app.

Swipe left to go back works inconsistently. It doesn’t work in some stores. 

I guess it gets high score based on what problem it solves, but the app is garbage and it gets worse. I bet UX or BA team is in constant rotation
title: Getting worse over time

review: I had an older iphone 6s with a weaker battery, and i would literally race the clock to order through glovo. The battery percentage would decrease on the fly, 1% every 10-15 seconds. I blamed it on the phone, even though other applications would not do that. Now I have an iphone 12 pro and its almost the same. The phone gets hot and battery usage is huge. What kind of processing are you doing? I have 2 other delivery apps, and none of them or other apps use that much battery and make the phone hot. Not even most games do that. It feels like the phone’s processing power is being misused. Either optimize or rewrite your code, this is unacceptable
title: Battery drainer

review:
You know I thought this was a good initiative till I placed my first order. My colleague at work was celebrating his birthday and I  wanted to surprise him so I ordered pizza from Cheezy pizza and i paid through Mobile money. I was charged and deducted only to wait for an hour to see that my order has been cancelled. Without any communication. So i placed another order thinking Glovo would use the initial money they deducted and they asked me to pay additional money for the new order. So I tried to cancel but there was no option to cancel the order. I chat with their customer support only for them to tell me they will charge me product and driver fees when i go ahead with the cancellation. That aside, I ask for a refund for the initial order i placed and they told me to wait 24-72 hours!! Like is this even for real? What kind of service are you offering to your customers Glovo? So I should wait 24-72 hours to get money we I was charged so I could surprise someone on his birthday? And what’s pissing me off the most is the standoffish attitude these so called customer support agents show. This is the worst experience anyone could ever experience. 
I have deleted this app and will tell everyone I know to do same. SHAME!!!!!!
title: WORST DELIVERY APP & CUSTOMER SERVICE

review: Stilling your date, constantly pushing you to keep location active so it can still more date, order cancelled after hour and a half of waiting in the middle of the night (this happened few times), employing people that barely speak the language and don’t know how to use maps. And that its says it’s cool we will give you free delivery next time, tonight you can eat a carpet, well #%! you too. Can’t wait for people to start opening companies for group suits of applications like they do for airlines.

review:
Would respond immediately to what they ask for.  Photos sent twice.  No response follow up again — finally some said ok here’s a credit for your missing items.  And free delivery.  Well. I was already offered free delivery when the rep emailed our records show they were delivered. 

VERY STRANGE DELIVERY TOO the man came up the elevator twice.   Even super large orders they fill up the elevator. Then come up.  One stop.   Signature at first stop.    €2 tip Bc there was to be heavy bags of soda, wine. He took the tip   The signature. And never brought up the rest of the order. 

Only  Half were delivered.  

AND The credit BACK TO MY CARD TAKING 7 business days I was offered covered only half the missing items.  Which were expensive items including alcohol.   

I emailed them again this morning saying thank you but you omitted these items also.   No response.  

And what about when they did all that promo for whole into for €6 with a code that never ever worked.    I actually use them a lot Bc frankly it’s the only one I have figured out and know.  But if pretty good customers are undervalued it’s time to see if it’s company specific.  Trying someone new 

Best,
CW
title: Follow up with items not delivered extremely poor

Use PedidoYa, it’s much better than Glovo.

review:
Hello!
My name is Svitlana Sapsai, I am the brand manager of the cafe "City-Zen café&bar" in Kiev, Ukraine.
Today, in one of our cafes at 3, Victory Avenue an order was made through your delivery service. Your courier came to the cafe and showed an order on a mobile phone: 3 servings of spring rolls with salmon and three nut sauces for a total of 387.03 UAH. The order was issued at 17:00. After some time, a woman called the cafe to whom you delivered the order. She was very dissatisfied and pretended that she received not what she ordered. And also demanded to send her the correct order. The woman assured the manager that she ordered one croissant with salmon, one veggie spring roll, one spring roll with salmon and two nutty sauces. She also stated that no one had warned her about the delivery of UAH 60, and we should return the money for delivery to her. In order to quickly resolve the conflict, the manager of this cafe decided to replace her order with the correct one. The correct order was sent by taxi directly to this woman. We also reimbursed her the cost of delivery 60 UAH. Wrong order issued by you, this woman returned back on the same taxi. And put there a napkin with the words "Thank you for the terrible service!".
This whole situation would not have happened if you:
1) notified us that you intend to place the menu of our restaurant in your application and would ask permission to do so;
2) would be able to receive feedback from the consumers.
This woman could not understand that you are an intermediary, and that a mistake in the order was solely your fault. In the end, the woman was not satisfied with the service of the cafe, and not the work of your application.
The cafe managers, as well as the top management, were not aware of the fact that the menu of our cafe was placed in your application and could not transfer responsibility to you.
Because of such situations, our reputation suffers and we incur material costs for your mistakes. At the moment we cooperate exclusively with the food delivery service "Eda.ua”
We ask you to remove the menu of our cafe from your application and reimburse us for material expenses in the amount of 557 UAH.
title: Ukraine

review: Al realizar un pedido al mcdonalds, que se encuentra situado a 20 minutos caminando desde mi ubicacion, este tardo mas de una hora, pudiendo visualizar que el mensajero se encontro parado 20 minutos despues de haber recogido el pedido, luego se reasigna de mensajero el pedido justo cuando lo llamo , al llegar el pedido , llega otra persona diferente al que aparecia en la aplicacion, asi entregandome una bolsa semi abierta, y despidiendose con agilidad, cuando abro la bolsa encuentro servilletas sucias y faltante de varios de los articulos pedidos, al llamar a servicio al cliente y explicar mi situacion , al asesor le hace gracia mi caso y se rie, asi solo diciendome que me puede reenbolsar unicamente lo que faltaba , que es esto? Te obligan a compartir el glovo con el mensajero , pasa algo asi y les hace gracia... es un pesimo servicio , donde los mensajeros pueden hacer lo que quieran y no hay consecuencias , y ante las soluciones que te brindan deberia darles verguenza!
title: Pesimo servicio al cliente
